definition: perfectly round/(fig.) accommodating/considerate/smooth (way of doing things)
circle/round/circular/spherical/(of the moon) full/unit of Chinese currency (yuan)/tactful/to make consistent and whole (the narrative of a dream or a lie)

sentences.english: They are three things that your ears are not: hard, perfectly round and uni-size.
sentences.chinese: 你的耳朵不可能是硬的，渾圓的和統一尺寸的。

sentences.english: She has a perfectly round pearl.
sentences.chinese: 她珍藏着一顆渾圓的珍珠。

sentences.english: Got a chubby tummy but great breasts?
sentences.chinese: 腹部渾圓但是胸部很棒？

sentences.english: I have a chubby body, short legs and thick, soft fur.
sentences.chinese: 我還有一個渾圓的身體，短腿和又厚又軟的皮毛。

sentences.english: Uncovering the darkness sky there is a round moon that makes me blue.
sentences.chinese: 我掀開黑夜沉寂的幔帳，任一輪渾圓灑進我的窗口。

sentences.english: Roundness depends on the sharpness or radius of curvature of the edges .
sentences.chinese: 渾圓度取決於邊角的銳度或曲率半徑。

sentences.english: Rounded shape of the fish easy to contracting this disease.
sentences.chinese: 體形渾圓的魚易患此病。

sentences.english: There they were, full and rounded.
In one hand it held a crooked sceptre of jade, and in the other a round crystal.
sentences.chinese: 它一手擎着碧玉權杖，一手握着渾圓的水晶。

definition: mellow and full/suave/smooth and round/rich (in voice)
